title: Good mutations
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

This is a list of all of the **good mutations** which can be acquired. While most of these are useful to any character, some may in fact be significantly detrimental to some builds. Even so, they are included here because "good mutation" is a technical term in the game, not a qualitative judgment. Any of these can be acquired through any source of good mutations, such as a [potion of mutation](/Potion_of_mutation "Potion of mutation").

## Contents

- [1 Offensive](#Offensive)

  - [1.1 Fangs](#Fangs)
  - [1.2 Beak](#Beak)
  - [1.3 Claws](#Claws)
  - [1.4 Horns](#Horns)
  - [1.5 Hooves](#Hooves)
  - [1.6 Talons](#Talons)
  - [1.7 Passive Freeze](#Passive_Freeze)
  - [1.8 MP-Powered Wands](#MP-Powered_Wands)

- [2 Defensive](#Defensive)

  - [2.1 Shaggy Fur](#Shaggy_Fur)
  - [2.2 Camouflage](#Camouflage)

- [3 Resistances](#Resistances)

  - [3.1 Fire Resistance](#Fire_Resistance)
  - [3.2 Cold Resistance](#Cold_Resistance)
  - [3.3 Electricity Resistance](#Electricity_Resistance)
  - [3.4 Poison Resistance](#Poison_Resistance)
  - [3.5 Strong-Willed](#Strong-Willed)
  - [3.6 Clarity](#Clarity)
  - [3.7 Mutation Resistance](#Mutation_Resistance)

- [4 Perception](#Perception)

  - [4.1 Acute Vision](#Acute_Vision)
  - [4.2 Antennae](#Antennae)
  - [4.3 Sense Surroundings](#Sense_Surroundings)

- [5 General](#General)

  - [5.1 Evolution](#Evolution)
  - [5.2 Wild Magic](#Wild_Magic)
  - [5.3 Improved Attributes](#Improved_Attributes)
  - [5.4 Regeneration](#Regeneration)
  - [5.5 Robust](#Robust)
  - [5.6 High MP](#High_MP)

- [6 Scales](#Scales)

  - [6.1 Iridescent Scales](#Iridescent_Scales)
  - [6.2 Large Bone Plates](#Large_Bone_Plates)
  - [6.3 Thin Skeletal Structure](#Thin_Skeletal_Structure)
  - [6.4 Sturdy Frame](#Sturdy_Frame)

- [7 Species exclusive](#Species_exclusive)

  - [7.1 Spit Poison](#Spit_Poison)
  - [7.2 Stinger](#Stinger)
  - [7.3 Big Wings](#Big_Wings)
  - [7.4 Tentacle Spike](#Tentacle_Spike)

- [8 See Also](#See_Also)

- [9 History](#History)

## Offensive

Some of these mutations will prevent your character from wearing items in certain equipment slots. While this penalty may outweigh the gain your character receives, bear in mind that races which cannot use those slots ([ogres](/Ogre "Ogre"), [trolls](/Troll "Troll"), [felids](/Felid "Felid"), etc.) lose nothing.

### Fangs

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                           |                             |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Effect                                                    | Flavor                      |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [Auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") bite attack.          | You have sharp teeth.       |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Improved [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") bite attack. | You have very sharp teeth.  |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Superior [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") bite attack. | You have razor-sharp teeth. |
| **Damage:** `1 + (2 * rank)` **Chance**: `40% * (30 + XL)/59` per melee attack Having [Acidic Bite](/Acidic_Bite "Acidic Bite") adds `4` base damage and `2d4` acid damage. If [Vine Stalker](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker"), add `XL/3` damage, chance increased to `100% * (30 + XL)/59`, and grants [antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic"). |                                                           |                             |
| **Species notes:** [Vampires](/Vampire "Vampire") and [Felids](/Felid "Felid") start with rank 3. [Gnolls](/Gnoll "Gnoll") have rank 1. [Vine Stalkers](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker") start with rank 2 and upgrade to rank 3 at XL 8.                                                                                                     |                                                           |                             |
| [Good mutation](), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                           |                             |

### Beak

|                                                                   |                                                                                        |                              |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| Rank                                                              | Effect                                                                                 | Flavor                       |
| 1                                                                 | [Auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") peck attack. Prohibits [helmet](/Helmet "Helmet"). | You have a beak for a mouth. |
| **Damage:** `6` **Chance**: `66% * (30 + XL)/60` per melee attack |                                                                                        |                              |
| **Species notes:** Tengu start with Beak.                         |                                                                                        |                              |
| [Good mutation]()                                                 |                                                                                        |                              |

### Claws

|                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                      |                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                               | Effect                                                                               | Flavor                           |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                  | +2 [unarmed](/Unarmed "Unarmed") base damage. Negated by [gloves](/Gloves "Gloves"). | You have sharp fingernails.      |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                  | +4 [unarmed](/Unarmed "Unarmed") base damage. Negated by [gloves](/Gloves "Gloves"). | You have very sharp fingernails. |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                  | +6 [unarmed](/Unarmed "Unarmed") base damage. Prohibits [gloves](/Gloves "Gloves").  | You have claws for hands.        |
| Using Unarmed Combat with level 3 Claws will decapitate [hydra](/Hydra "Hydra") heads.                                                                             |                                                                                      |                                  |
| **Species notes:** [Ghouls](/Ghoul "Ghoul") start with rank 1 and [Trolls](/Troll "Troll") start with rank 3. [Octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") cannot gain claws. |                                                                                      |                                  |
| [Good mutation](), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutations "Demonspawn mutations")                                                                             |                                                                                      |                                  |

### Horns

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                      |                                              |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Effect                                                                                               | Flavor                                       |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [Auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") headbutt attack. Prohibits [helmets](/Helmet "Helmet").          | You have a pair of small horns on your head. |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Improved [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") headbutt attack. Prohibits [helmets](/Helmet "Helmet"). | You have a pair of horns on your head.       |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Superior [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") headbutt attack. Prohibits all headgear.                | You have a pair of large horns on your head. |
| **Damage:** `5 + (3 * rank)` **Chance**: `66% * (30 + XL)/59` per melee attack [Minotaurs](/Minotaur "Minotaur") may retaliate against enemies with headbutts.                                                                                     |                                                                                                      |                                              |
| **Species notes:** [Minotaurs](/Minotaur "Minotaur") start with rank 2, and [Oni](/Oni "Oni") start with rank 1. [Demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") can gain horns as a body slot option. [Octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") cannot gain horns. |                                                                                                      |                                              |
| [Good mutation](), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation")                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                      |                                              |

### Hooves

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                               |                                   |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Effect                                                                                        | Flavor                            |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [Auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") kick attack. Negated by [boots](/Boots "Boots").          | You have large cloven feet.       |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Improved [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") kick attack. Negated by [boots](/Boots "Boots"). | You have hoof-like feet.          |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Superior [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") kick attack. Prohibits [boots](/Boots "Boots").  | You have hooves in place of feet. |
| **Damage:** `5 + (5/3 * rank)` **Chance**: `100% * (30 + XL)/59` per melee attack                                                                                                                              |                                                                                               |                                   |
| **Species notes:** Demonspawn can gain hooves as a body slot option. [Nagas](/Naga "Naga"), [merfolk](/Merfolk "Merfolk"), [felids](/Felid "Felid"), and [octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") cannot gain hooves. |                                                                                               |                                   |
| [Good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation"), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation")                                                                                             |                                                                                               |                                   |

### Talons

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                               |                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Effect                                                                                        | Flavor                         |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | [Auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") kick attack. Negated by [boots](/Boots "Boots").          | You have sharp toenails.       |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Improved [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") kick attack. Negated by [boots](/Boots "Boots"). | You have razor-sharp toenails. |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Superior [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") kick attack. Prohibits [boots](/Boots "Boots").  | You have claws for feet.       |
| **Species notes:** Tengu start at rank 3. Demonspawn can gain talons as a body slot option. [Nagas](/Naga "Naga"), [merfolk](/Merfolk "Merfolk"), [felids](/Felid "Felid"), and [octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") cannot gain talons. |                                                                                               |                                |
| [Good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation"), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation")                                                                                                                    |                                                                                               |                                |

### Passive Freeze

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                       |                                                               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Effect                                                                                | Flavor                                                        |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | When hit in melee, you retaliate with [Freeze](/Freeze "Freeze") (1d10, 100% chance). | A frigid envelope surrounds you and freezes all who hurt you. |
| Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), was a three rank [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation"). Rank 1 gave rC+, Rank 2 gave immunity to freezing clouds, and Rank 3 gave passive freeze. Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), Rank 1 granted [potion](/Potion "Potion") [conservation](/Conservation "Conservation"), and rank 2 granted rC+. |                                                                                       |                                                               |
| [Good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                       |                                                               |

### MP-Powered Wands

|                                                                                                                      |                                                 |                                                         |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                 | Effect                                          | Flavor                                                  |
| 1                                                                                                                    | Automatically boosts wands, using 3 MP per zap. | You expend magic power (3 MP) to strengthen your wands. |
| Boosts the power of your [wands](/Wands "Wands") by 33%. If you don't have enough MP, you'll use the wand unboosted. |                                                 |                                                         |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                    |                                                 |                                                         |

## Defensive

### Shaggy Fur

|                                                                                                                                           |            |                                           |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                      | Effect     | Flavor                                    |
| 1                                                                                                                                         | +1 AC      | You are covered in fur.                   |
| 2                                                                                                                                         | +2 AC      | You are covered in thick fur.             |
| 3                                                                                                                                         | +3 AC, rC+ | Your thick and shaggy fur keeps you warm. |
| **Species notes:** [Trolls](/Troll "Troll") and [felids](/Felid "Felid") start at rank 1; felids gain rank 2 at XL 6 and rank 3 at XL 12. |            |                                           |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                         |            |                                           |

### Camouflage

|                                                                       |              |                                                      |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                  | Effect       | Flavor                                               |
| 1                                                                     | +40 Stealth  | Your skin changes colour to match your surroundings. |
| 2                                                                     | +80 Stealth  | Your skin blends seamlessly with your surroundings.  |
| 3                                                                     | +120 Stealth | Your skin perfectly mimics your surroundings.        |
| **Species notes:** [Octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") start at rank 1. |              |                                                      |
| [Good mutation]()                                                     |              |                                                      |

## Resistances

### Fire Resistance

|                                                                                                 |        |                                                     |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                            | Effect | Flavor                                              |
| 1                                                                                               | rF+    | Your flesh is heat resistant.                       |
| 2                                                                                               | rF++   | Your flesh is very heat resistant.                  |
| 3                                                                                               | rF+++  | Your flesh is almost immune to the effects of heat. |
| **Species notes:** Red [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") develop rank 1 upon changing color. |        |                                                     |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                               |        |                                                     |

### Cold Resistance

|                                                                                                   |        |                                                     |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                              | Effect | Flavor                                              |
| 1                                                                                                 | rC+    | Your flesh is cold resistant.                       |
| 2                                                                                                 | rC++   | Your flesh is very cold resistant.                  |
| 3                                                                                                 | rC+++  | Your flesh is almost immune to the effects of cold. |
| **Species notes:** White [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") develop rank 1 upon changing color. |        |                                                     |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                 |        |                                                     |

### Electricity Resistance

|                                                                                                                                                        |        |                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | ------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                   | Effect | Flavor                                |
| 1                                                                                                                                                      | rElec  | You are resistant to electric shocks. |
| **Species notes:** [Gargoyles](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle") start with rank 1. Black [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") develop rank 1 upon changing color. |        |                                       |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                      |        |                                       |

### Poison Resistance

|                                                                                                                                                                                                            |        |                                      |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Effect | Flavor                               |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                          | rPois  | Your system is resistant to poisons. |
| **Species notes:** [Nagas](/Naga "Naga") start with rank 1. Green [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") develop rank 1 upon changing color. [Gargoyles](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle") are instead immune to poison. |        |                                      |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                                                          |        |                                      |

### Strong-Willed

|                   |                                      |                                                                     |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank              | Effect                               | Flavor                                                              |
| 1                 | [Willpower](/Willpower "Willpower")+ | You are resistant to hostile enchantments.                          |
| 2                 | Willpower++                          | You are highly resistant to hostile enchantments.                   |
| 3                 | Willpower+++                         | You are extremely resistant to the effects of hostile enchantments. |
| [Good mutation]() |                                      |                                                                     |

### Clarity

|                   |                               |                                             |
| ----------------- | ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| Rank              | Effect                        | Flavor                                      |
| 1                 | [Clarity](/Clarity "Clarity") | You possess an exceptional clarity of mind. |
| [Good mutation]() |                               |                                             |

### Mutation Resistance

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Effect                                                                                                                                      | Flavor                                                                           |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 66.6% resistance to further mutation (50% for [transient mutations](/Mutation#Transient_Mutations "Mutation")).                             | You are somewhat resistant to further mutation.                                  |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 66.6% resistance to further mutation (50% for [transient mutations](/Mutation#Transient_Mutations "Mutation")). Mutation removal fails 50%. | You are somewhat resistant to both further mutation and mutation removal.        |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 100% resistance to further mutation. Mutation removal fails 100%.                                                                           | You are almost entirely resistant to both further mutation and mutation removal. |
| This mutation stacks with other sources of mutation protection such as [Zin](/Zin "Zin") and the [hat of the Alchemist](/Hat_of_the_Alchemist "Hat of the Alchemist") multiplicatively. Rank 3 of the mutation can only be removed by [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva"), [Xom](/Xom "Xom") (retribution or not), [Zin](/Zin "Zin") (retribution), or by [magical contamination](/Magical_contamination "Magical contamination"). |                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                  |
| **Species notes:** Prior to their [0.27](/0.27 "0.27") removal, Halflings started at rank 1.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                  |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                  |

## Perception

### Acute Vision

|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                         |                                         |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                       | Effect                                                  | Flavor                                  |
| 1                                                                                                                                                          | Grants [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"). | You have supernaturally acute eyesight. |
| **Species notes:** [Nagas](/Naga "Naga"), [spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan"), [vampires](/Vampire "Vampire"), and [felids](/Felid "Felid") start with this. |                                                         |                                         |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                          |                                                         |                                         |

### Antennae

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                 |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Effect                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | Flavor                                          |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Shows the location of all invisible enemies in [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"). Detects all monsters within 3 tiles, even through [walls](/Wall "Wall") or opaque [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud"). Prohibits [helmets](/Helmet "Helmet"). | You have a pair of small antennae on your head. |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Range increases to 5 tiles. Prohibits helmets.                                                                                                                                                                                                     | You have a pair of antennae on your head.       |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Range increases to 7 tiles. Grants [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"). Prohibits all headgear.                                                                                                                                        | You have a pair of large antennae on your head. |
| When playing in console mode, creatures not in line of sight are revealed as { or { glyphs, depending on whether the entity is hostile or friendly. In tile mode, they appear as icons which similarly indicate hostility. [Mimics](/Mimic "Mimic") will be identified as soon as they enter your antennae range. |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                 |
| **Species notes:** [Formicids](/Formicid "Formicid") start with rank 3. [Demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") can gain antennae as a body slot option.                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                 |
| [Good mutation](), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                 |

### Sense Surroundings

|                   |                                                    |                                            |
| ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| Rank              | Effect                                             | Flavor                                     |
| 1                 | Reveal random tiles outside [LOS](/LOS "LOS")      | You passively map a small area around you. |
| 2                 | Reveal more random tiles outside [LOS](/LOS "LOS") | You passively map the area around you.     |
| 3                 | Reveal many random tiles outside [LOS](/LOS "LOS") | You passively map a large area around you. |
| [Good mutation]() |                                                    |                                            |

## General

### Evolution

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                              |                                          |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Effect                                       | Flavor                                   |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Gain mutations until trait expires.          | You have hidden genetic potential.       |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Same as previous level, though lasts longer. | You have great hidden genetic potential. |
| Triggers about once per [XL](/XL "XL"), providing another [good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation"). Every two activations, it reduces its level by one. Changed in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), see the [Evolution](/Evolution "Evolution") page for more details. |                                              |                                          |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                                              |                                          |

### Wild Magic

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                  |                                                                      |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Effect                                                                                           | Flavor                                                               |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [Spell Power](/Spell_Power "Spell Power")+, [Spell Success](/Spell_Success "Spell Success")-     | Your spells are a little harder to cast, but a little more powerful. |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [Spell Power](/Spell_Power "Spell Power")++, [Spell Success](/Spell_Success "Spell Success")--   | Your spells are harder to cast, but more powerful.                   |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [Spell Power](/Spell_Power "Spell Power")+++, [Spell Success](/Spell_Success "Spell Success")--- | Your spells are much harder to cast, but much more powerful.         |
| Each level gives +30% (additively stacked, then multiplied) to [raw spellpower](/Spellpower "Spellpower") and +4% (additive) to [raw spell failure rate](/Spell_Success#Modifiers "Spell Success"). Generally, you will get less than +30% actual power. You will get less than +4% failure if your failure is already low (< 8%), but slightly more if your failure is high. |                                                                                                  |                                                                      |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                  |                                                                      |

### Improved Attributes

|                                                                                                          |                                                  |                                                                            |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                     | Effect                                           | Flavor                                                                     |
| 1                                                                                                        | +4 to STR, INT or DEX -1 to the other two stats. | Your muscles are strong. Your mind is acute. You are agile.                |
| 2                                                                                                        | +8 to STR, INT or DEX -2 to the other stats      | Your muscles are very strong. Your mind is very acute. You are very agile. |
| It's possible to gain this mutation for multiple different stats, but each stat may have up to 2 levels. |                                                  |                                                                            |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                        |                                                  |                                                                            |

### Regeneration

|                                                                                                                                                                          |                                   |                                                 |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                     | Effect                            | Flavor                                          |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                        | HP regeneration rate +0.8 HP/turn | Your natural rate of healing is unusually fast. |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                        | HP regeneration rate +1.6 HP/turn | You heal very quickly.                          |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                        | HP regeneration rate +2.4 HP/turn | You regenerate.                                 |
| Each level healed 1 HP/turn in [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), and 0.4HP/turn prior. Excludes [Slow Metabolism](/Slow_Metabolism "Slow Metabolism") prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"). |                                   |                                                 |
| **Species notes:** [Trolls](/Troll "Troll") start at rank 1. [Vine Stalkers](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker") gain rank 1 at XL 4.                                          |                                   |                                                 |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                        |                                   |                                                 |

### Robust

|                                                                                                                    |             |                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- | ------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                               | Effect      | Flavor                    |
| 1                                                                                                                  | +10% max HP | You are robust.           |
| 2                                                                                                                  | +20% max HP | You are very robust.      |
| 3                                                                                                                  | +30% max HP | You are extremely robust. |
| [Good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation"), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation") |             |                           |

### High MP

|                                                                    |             |                                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                               | Effect      | Flavor                                                |
| 1                                                                  | +10% max MP | You have an increased reservoir of magic.             |
| 2                                                                  | +20% max MP | You have a considerably increased reservoir of magic. |
| 3                                                                  | +30% max MP | You have a greatly increased reservoir of magic.      |
| **Species notes:** [Demigods](/Demigod "Demigod") start at rank 1. |             |                                                       |
| [Good mutation]()                                                  |             |                                                       |

## Scales

As they level, non-"monstrous" [demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") naturally receive three ranks of a single scales mutation; other sources of mutation will only give the scales they would get naturally. [Draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") have natural scales independent of these mutations, and are unable to gain other scales. Currently only checked for iridescent scales, this may be a bug.

### Iridescent Scales

|                                                 |        |                                                  |
| ----------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------ |
| Rank                                            | Effect | Flavor                                           |
| 1                                               | +2 AC  | You are partially covered in iridescent scales.  |
| 2                                               | +4 AC  | You are mostly covered in iridescent scales.     |
| 3                                               | +6 AC  | You are completely covered in iridescent scales. |
| [Good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation") |        |                                                  |

### Large Bone Plates

|                                                                                                                    |        |                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | ------------------------------------------------ |
| Rank                                                                                                               | Effect | Flavor                                           |
| 1                                                                                                                  | +4 SH  | You are partially covered in large bone plates.  |
| 2                                                                                                                  | +6 SH  | You are mostly covered in large bone plates.     |
| 3                                                                                                                  | +8 SH  | You are completely covered in large bone plates. |
| [Good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation"), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation") |        |                                                  |

### Thin Skeletal Structure

|                                                                                                                    |                     |                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| Rank                                                                                                               | Effect              | Flavor                                           |
| 1                                                                                                                  | +2 DEX, +25 Stealth | You have a somewhat thin skeletal structure.     |
| 2                                                                                                                  | +4 DEX, +50 Stealth | You have a moderately thin skeletal structure.   |
| 3                                                                                                                  | +6 DEX, +75 Stealth | You have an unnaturally thin skeletal structure. |
| [Good mutation](/Good_mutation "Good mutation"), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation") |                     |                                                  |
| In earlier versions of *Crawl*, this mutation also reduced [strength](/Strength "Strength") by 1 per rank.         |                     |                                                  |

### Sturdy Frame

|                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                  |                                                                     |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                              | Effect                                                                           | Flavor                                                              |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                 | -2 [Encumbrance](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") from equipped armour. | Your movements are slightly less encumbered by armour. (ER -2)      |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                 | -4 [Encumbrance](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") from equipped armour. | Your movements are less encumbered by armour. (ER -4)               |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                 | -6 [Encumbrance](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") from equipped armour. | Your movements are significantly less encumbered by armour. (ER -6) |
| This mutation allows the player to wear heavier [Armour](/Armour "Armour") without the associated penalties to [EV](/EV "EV") or [Spell Success](/Spell_Success "Spell Success"). |                                                                                  |                                                                     |
| [Good mutation](), [Demonspawn mutation](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation")                                                                                              |                                                                                  |                                                                     |

## Species exclusive

These mutations may only be acquired by certain [species](/Species "Species"). Does not include [demonspawn mutations](/Demonspawn_mutation "Demonspawn mutation"), and only includes mutations that can be acquired/improved randomly.

### Spit Poison

|                                                                             |                                                                   |                                   |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                        | Effect                                                            | Flavor                            |
| 1                                                                           | Grants the [Spit Poison](/Spit_Poison "Spit Poison") ability.     | You can spit poison.              |
| 2                                                                           | Upgrades to [Breathe Poison](/Poisonous_Cloud "Poisonous Cloud"). | You can exhale a cloud of poison. |
| **Species notes:** Exclusve to [Nagas](/Naga "Naga"), who start at level 1. |                                                                   |                                   |
| [Good mutation]()                                                           |                                                                   |                                   |

### Stinger

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                           |                                                        |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Effect                                                                                    | Flavor                                                 |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Adds damage and [Venom](/Venom "Venom") to [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") tail slap. | Your tail ends in a poisonous barb.                    |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Adds more damage to [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") tail slap.                        | Your tail ends in a sharp poisonous barb.              |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Adds most damage to [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") tail slap.                        | Your tail ends in a wickedly sharp and poisonous barb. |
| **Damage:** `6 + (4 if you have Armoured Tail) + (2 * rank)` **Chance**: `50% * (30 + XL)/59` per melee attack                                                                                                           |                                                                                           |                                                        |
| **Species notes:** Exclusive to [Nagas](/Naga "Naga"), [Armataurs](/Armataur "Armataur"), and [Draconians](/Draconian "Draconian"), who can get this randomly. Green draconians gain rank 1 at XL14 (and may gain more). |                                                                                           |                                                        |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                           |                                                        |

### Big Wings

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                        |                                                                     |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Effect                                 | Flavor                                                              |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | You now [fly](/Fly "Fly") permanently. | You have big, strong wings, capable of bearing you through the air. |
| Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), flight could be toggled on or off. Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), the flight granted by this mutation was temporary if it wasn't from your species.                                                                             |                                        |                                                                     |
| **Species notes:** Exclusive to [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") and [gargoyles](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle"). Black draconians and gargoyles naturally develop it at XL 14, though other draconians can acquire it as a random [mutation](/Mutation "Mutation"). |                                        |                                                                     |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                        |                                                                     |

### Tentacle Spike

|                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                        |                                                    |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                               | Effect                                                                 | Flavor                                             |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Adds damage to [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") tentacle slap.      | One of your tentacles bears a spike.               |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Adds more damage to [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") tentacle slap. | One of your tentacles bears a nasty spike.         |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Adds most damage to [auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") tentacle slap. | One of your tentacles bears a large vicious spike. |
| **Damage:** `5 + rank` **Chance**: `100% * (30 + XL)/59` per melee attack                                                                                                                          |                                                                        |                                                    |
| **Species notes:** Exclusive to [octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode"). Octopodes may also temporarily induce rank 3 of this mutation with [Beastly Appendage](/Beastly_Appendage "Beastly Appendage"). |                                                                        |                                                    |
| [Good mutation]()                                                                                                                                                                                  |                                                                        |                                                    |

## See Also

- [Bad mutations](/Bad_mutations "Bad mutations")
- [Demonspawn mutations](/Demonspawn_mutations "Demonspawn mutations")
- [Jiyva mutations](/Jiyva_mutations "Jiyva mutations")

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), you could obtain many different [scale mutations](/Demonspawn_mutation#Scales_Facets "Demonspawn mutation"); there was a hard limit of 3 levels (of any combination of scale mutation) at a time. [Blink (mutation)](/Blink_\(mutation\) "Blink (mutation)") was removed, [Noise Dampening](/Noise_Dampening "Noise Dampening") was added.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") the Fast mutation was available as a random mutation and the Antennae mutation did not show invisible enemy indicators outside range 3 & 5 at ranks 1 & 2.
- In [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), the [Teleport Control](/Teleport_Control "Teleport Control"), [Strong Stiff](/Strong_Stiff "Strong Stiff"), and [Flexible Weak](/Flexible_Weak "Flexible Weak") mutations were removed, and Improved Attributes was changed to only have 2 levels, each of which granted +2 to an attribute.
html:
Good mutations

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

This is a list of all of the good mutations which can be acquired. While most of these are useful to any character, some may in fact be significantly detrimental to some builds. Even so, they are included here because "good mutation" is a technical term in the game, not a qualitative judgment. Any of these can be acquired through any source of good mutations, such as a potion of mutation.

Contents

  • 1 Offensive
    • 1.1 Fangs
    • 1.2 Beak
    • 1.3 Claws
    • 1.4 Horns
    • 1.5 Hooves
    • 1.6 Talons
    • 1.7 Passive Freeze
    • 1.8 MP-Powered Wands
  • 2 Defensive
    • 2.1 Shaggy Fur
    • 2.2 Camouflage
  • 3 Resistances
    • 3.1 Fire Resistance
